ComicInfo.Title: "You've got a lot of explaining to do, Zack!" [Tech Jacket Chapter 1 of 8]
ComicInfo.Summary: THE VILTRUMITE WAR BEGINS! The entire series has been leading up to this! The pieces are in place, the time to strike is now! It's all out war as the Coalition of Planets finally make its move against the Viltrum Empire--with Invincible stuck in the middle. Things will never be the same after this--and this is INVINCIBLE, so you know we mean it.
